mapper.select: select pr.gameNo,rn.themeName,pr.gameState,to_char(pr.regdate,'yy-mm-dd') regdate,pr.themeNo,pr.totalPerson,rn.reserveName,rn.reserveTime from prerecord pr , (select p.gameno,t.themename,r.reservename,r.reserveno,rt.reservetime from prerecord p , theme t , reservedate rd , reservetime rt , reserve r where p.themeno = t.themeno and t.themeno = rd.themeno and rd.reservedateno = rt.reservedateno and rt.reservetimeno = r.reservetimeno) rn where pr.reserveno = rn.reserveno and pr.gameno = rn.gameno and pr.gamestate = '진행중'
select u.id from prerecord p , reservepeople rp , users u where p.reserveno=rp.reserveno and rp.userno = u.userno and p.gameno = #{gameNo}

select pr.gameNo,rn.themeName,pr.gameState,to_char(pr.regdate,'yy-mm-dd') regdate,pr.themeNo,pr.totalPerson,rn.reserveName,rn.reserveTime from prerecord pr , (select p.gameno,t.themename,r.reservename,r.reserveno,rt.reservetime from prerecord p , theme t , reservedate rd , reservetime rt , reserve r where p.themeno = t.themeno and t.themeno = rd.themeno and rd.reservedateno = rt.reservedateno and rt.reservetimeno = r.reservetimeno) rn where pr.reserveno = rn.reserveno and pr.gameno = rn.gameno and pr.gamestate = '완료'
select recordtime,recordhints,recordno from record where gameno = #{gameNo} and rownum = 1
